name: Storia del prodigio
desc:
Through this tale, you can master the method to make the catalyst "Fruit of Fulfillment."

This tale is about portents and disasters.

"In truth, the moon did not always look like a pearl..."

value.name: Racconti di te insieme agli Aranara
value.desc: So many wonderful things transpired during your adventures with the Aranara. In the world of the Aranara where stories are highly valued, maybe someone is willing to "exchange" these with you.
